modName: Vernon Roche The Witcher Voiced Follower
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][center][img]http://i57.tinypic.com/okyc1i.jpg[/img]
Commander of the Blue Stripes, leader of the Temerian army... the one and only, Vernon Roche.
This mod adds Vernon Roche as a follower to your game. He's fully voiced, although this is just the first release so you can expect more dialogue to be added. 
He specializes in Two Handed combat.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2327413]TH3WICK3D1[/url]'s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7807/?]Blue Stripes Armor[/url] is REQUIRED for this mod to work properly. 
[color=#ffff00]You can find him at the Four Shields Tavern in Dragonbridge[/color]
[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/rh6978.jpg[/img]
Credits: TH3WICK3D1 for Blue Stripes Elite Armor
And CD Projekt Red for allowing use of their assets! [/center][/size]
author: imAarwyn
